ComicInfo.Title: Menace is a Man Called Malice!
ComicInfo.Summary:
The villainous Malice sets the Hollywood Wax Museum ablaze! Ghost Rider responds by dousing him in hellfire...
Note: Features the Hostess Twinkies Cakes ad, Spider-Man And Madam Web!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-22 10:30:28. [CVDB17680]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Don Heck, Don Heck, Gil Kane
ComicInfo.Inker: Tony DeZuniga, Don Heck, Steve Leialoha
ComicInfo.Letterer: Gaspar Saladino, Denise Wohl, John Costanza
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Gil Kane, John Costanza, Steve Leialoha
ComicInfo.Characters: Carson Collier Sr., Ghost Rider (Blaze), Karen Page, Malice, Roxanne Simpson Blaze, Stunt-Master, Zarathos
